practice_phrases.target: I want to speak with you.
I want to speak very well.

practice_phrases.known: 我想和会说英语的人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I want to speak with people who speak English.

practice_phrases.known: 我很快就要开始说英语了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start speaking English soon.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我整天都在说。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I'm speaking all day.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我今天晚上要和别人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm going to speak with someone else this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我在尽可能多地练习说英语。
practice_phrases.target: I'm trying to practise speaking English as often as possible.
